channel.title: Baner Poster Update /edit on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Baner Poster Update /edit on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: BTSC Staff Nurse Amitcard Available
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has officially announced the Staff Nurse Computer-Based Test (CBT) schedule under Advt. No. 23/2025. The exam will be conducted on 30 July, 31 July, 1 August, and 3 August 2025 across multiple shifts. Candidates who have applied for over 11,000 Staff Nurse posts should prepare accordingly. The admit card will be released soon on the official website btsc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: RSSB Librarian Gr-III Exam City / Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has announced important details for the Librarian Grade‚ÄëIII Exam 2025. The exam city intimation slip was released on July 21, 2025, allowing candidates to check their allotted exam city in advance. The admit card will be available for download starting from July 24, 2025, on the official recruitment portal recruitment.rajasthan.gov.in. The written examination is scheduled to be held on July 27, 2025, in two shifts ‚Äî the first from 10:00 AM to 12:00 Noon and the second from 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM. Candidates are advised to download their admit cards on time and carefully review the details such as exam center, shift timing, and guidelines to avoid any last-minute issues.

item.title: NTA UGC NET June 2025 Result Declared
MPESB Animal Husbandry ADDET 2025 Result Declared
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the ADDET 2025 Result for the Animal Husbandry and Dairy Technology Diploma Entrance Test. Candidates who appeared in the exam can now check their scores, download the result PDF, and view the merit list and cutoff details on the official MPESB website.

item.title: Territorial Army Officer Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Territorial Army has released the Officer Admit Card 2025 on its official website. Registered candidates can download their admit card using their login credentials. The written examination will be conducted as per the scheduled date mentioned on the admit card. It is mandatory to carry the admit card and a valid photo ID to the exam center.

item.title: BPSC Bihar Assistant Engineer 2025 Admit Card
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the Admit Card for the Assistant Engineer (AE) Recruitment 2025 under Advertisement Nos. 29/2025, 30/2025, and 31/2025. The exam is scheduled to be held from 17th to 19th July 2025, and candidates can download their admit cards from 14th July 2025 by visiting the official website bpsc.bihar.gov.in. The admit card is a mandatory document to appear in the exam, and it contains key details like exam date, time, venue, and instructions.

item.title: HPSC Assistant Professor Result 2025
item.description: The Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has declared the final result for Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025 on July 11. A total of 2,424 vacancies across multiple subjects have been filled. Candidates can now check their roll numbers in the final selection list PDF available on the official website hpsc.gov.in. The recruitment included a written test and document verification process.

item.title: RRB Assistant Loco Pilot ALP CBAT Admitcard 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the Exam City Intimation Slip for the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) CBAT 2025. Candidates can now check their allotted exam city and centre details through the official RRB regional websites. This information helps applicants plan their travel and exam preparations accordingly.

item.title: Central Bank ZBO Exam Result 2025
item.description: Central Bank of India has officially released the Zone Based Officer (ZBO) Result 2025. Candidates who appeared for the exam can now check their results, download the merit list PDF, and verify their selection status. The result includes zone-wise shortlisted candidates based on written exam and interview performance. Visit the official website or use the direct link provided here to check your result, cutoff marks, and other important updates

item.title: Rajasthan HC Civil Judge Pre Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan High Court has released the Admit Card for Civil Judge Prelims Exam 2025. Candidates can now download their hall ticket from the official website. The exam aims to recruit Civil Judges across Rajasthan. Admit card includes exam date, time, and venue details.

item.title: MP Ladli Bahna 26th Installment Date 2025: Payment Status, List & Update
item.description:

item.title: RPSC Research Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the Research Assistant Admit Card 2025 on its official website. Candidates who have applied for the examination can now download their admit card by visiting rpsc.rajasthan.gov.in. The admit card contains important details such as exam date, time, center, and instructions. Candidates must carry a valid ID proof along with the admit card to the exam center.

item.title: RRB NTPC 10+2 Under Graduate Level Exam Date/ Application Status 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially released the exam dates for the NTPC 10+2 (Under Graduate) level posts. The Computer Based Test (CBT 1) will be conducted from 7 August to 8 September 2025. Candidates who have applied for the RRB NTPC UG posts can check the detailed exam schedule on the official RRB websites. This exam is conducted for 12th-pass candidates applying for various undergraduate-level posts in Indian Railways.

item.title: JHC Jharkhand High Court Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Jharkhand High Court (JHC) has officially released the Assistant Admit Card 2025 for the upcoming recruitment examination. Candidates who applied for the post of Assistant can now download their hall ticket from the official website jhc.org.in. The examination is scheduled to be held on 20th July 2025. The admit card contains important details such as exam date, time, venue, and candidate information. It is mandatory to carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid photo ID to the examination center.

item.title: Bihar Vidhan Sabha Security Guard Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Vidhan Sabha has released the admit card for the Security Guard Recruitment Exam 2025. Candidates can download the hall ticket from the official website to check their exam date, time, and center details.

item.title: NTA CUET UG Result 2025
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has officially declared the CUET UG 2025 results. Candidates who appeared for the Common University Entrance Test can now check their scorecards on the official website ‚Äì cuet.samarth.ac.in. The result includes detailed marks, percentiles, and overall performance. Students need their application number and date of birth to log in and view the result. Based on the scores, universities will proceed with their admission processes.

item.title: RPSC Various Vacancy Admit Card 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the admit card for various posts under its 2025 recruitment drive. Candidates can now download their hall tickets from the official RPSC website. The admit card includes important details such as exam date, time, venue, and candidate information. All applicants must carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid ID proof to the examination center.

item.title: Railway RRB ALP CEN 01/2024 Stage II Result with Marks 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has declared the Stage II Result for the ALP CEN 01/2024 recruitment. Candidates who appeared in the exam can now check their marks and download the official scorecard. The result includes cutoff details and merit list for further selection.

item.title: Bihar BSPHCL Technician Gr-III Exam Date 2025
item.description: Bihar State Power Holding Company Limited (BSPHCL) has officially released the exam dates for the Technician Grade III recruitment 2025. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled to be conducted from 11 July to 22 July 2025. Candidates who have applied for the post can check the detailed exam schedule on the official BSPHCL website. Admit cards will be released prior to the exam date.

item.title: Jharkhand ACF Pre Exam Admit Card 2025
item.description: Jharkhand Public Service Commission (JPSC) has released the Preliminary Admit Card for the post of Assistant Conservator of Forest (ACF) 2025. Candidates who have applied for the exam can now download their hall ticket from the official website. The admit card includes important details such as exam date, time, venue, and instructions.

item.title: DSSSB Admit Card 2025 Released for Various Post Codes
item.description: DSSSB has released the admit cards for various post code examinations scheduled between June 23 to July 9, 2025. Candidates can download their hall tickets from the official website dsssb.delhi.gov.in by entering their application number and date of birth. The admit card contains exam date, shift, venue, and important instructions.

item.title: Patna HC Translator Final Result 2025
item.description: The Patna High Court has announced the final result for the Translator and Translator-cum-Proof Reader Recruitment 2025. A total of 80 candidates have been selected under Advertisement No. PHC/01/2024. The merit list is available on the official website. Candidates who appeared in the exam can now check their selection status online.

item.title: DFCCIL MTS, Executive & Jr. Manager Exam Date 2025
item.description: DFCCIL has announced the exam dates for MTS, Executive, and Junior Manager posts under its 2025 recruitment. The CBT will be conducted in multiple phases. Candidates can visit the official website at dfccil.com to check the complete schedule and updates.

item.title: UP Police Radio Head Operator 2022 Final Result PDF Out
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has declared the final result for the UP Police Radio Cadre Head Operator Recruitment 2022. Candidates can now download the final merit list PDF and check their selection status for the year 2025.

item.title: RRB ALP CBAT Exam Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially announced the exam date for the Computer-Based Aptitude Test (CBAT) under the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) recruitment, CEN 01/2024. The CBAT exam is scheduled to be held on 15th July 2025. Candidates who qualified in CBT-2 are eligible to appear for this final stage. The City Intimation Slip is expected to be released from 5th July 2025, and the admit cards will likely be available from 11th July 2025. Aadhaar-based biometric verification will be mandatory on the exam day. For more details, candidates are advised to visit the official RRB website at rrbcdg.gov.in.

item.title: UPSC CPF Assistant Commandant Final Result 2025
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the Final Result for the Central Armed Police Forces (Assistant Commandants) Examination 2025. Candidates who appeared in the recruitment process can now download the Final Selection List (Merit List PDF) from the official website.

item.title: UPCATET Result 2025
item.description: The UPCATET Result 2025 has been officially released on June 24, 2025, by Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture & Technology. Candidates who appeared for the UG, PG, and PhD entrance exams can now check and download their scorecard and rank card from the official website upcatet.net using their registration credentials. The result includes subject-wise marks, group rank, and category rank. The counselling process will begin soon for qualified candidates.

item.title: UPSSSC Junior Assistant Mains Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Subordinate Services Selection Commission (UPSSSC) has released the Mains Admit Card for the Junior Assistant Recruitment 2025. Candidates who qualified for the preliminary exam can now download their admit card from the official website, upsssc.gov.in. The admit card contains important details like exam date, reporting time, exam center, and instructions. It is mandatory to carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid ID proof on the exam day.

item.title: Rajasthan Cooperative Bank Result 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Cooperative Recruitment Board (RCRB) has declared the result for various posts including Clerk, Junior Assistant, Salesman, Manager, and others. Candidates who appeared in the examination can now check their results, merit list, and cutoff marks through the official website. The selection is based on written exam performance and document verification. Candidates are advised to download the result PDF and keep a copy for future reference.

item.title: Bihar BTSC GMO Result 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has officially released the GMO (General Medical Officer) Result 2025. Candidates who appeared for the examination can now check their results, merit list, and cut-off marks on the official BTSC website. The result PDF is available for download, and shortlisted candidates will be called for further procedures as per the official notice.

item.title: Bihar BSPHCL JCA Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar State Power Holding Company Limited (BSPHCL) has released the admit card for the Junior Customer Assistant (JCA) Recruitment Exam 2025. Candidates can download their hall ticket from the official website. The admit card includes important details such as exam date, time, venue, and instructions. Carrying the admit card along with a valid photo ID is mandatory to appear in the examination.

item.title: Punjab National Bank PNB Specialist Officer Result 2025
item.description: Punjab National Bank (PNB) has declared the Specialist Officer (SO) Result 2025 for various posts. A total of 1,836 candidates have been shortlisted for the interview round. Candidates who appeared for the written examination can now download the merit list PDF from the official website pnbindia.in.

item.title: BTSC Bihar Insect Collector Result 2025
RSKMP 5th & 8th Re-Exam Result Out
RPSC School Lecturer Admit Card 2025 Released
Railway RPF Constable Result 2025 Declared

item.title: DSSSB Various Posts Admit Card June 2025
item.description: DSSSB has released the admit cards for the Various Post Exam scheduled in June 2025. Candidates can download their hall tickets from the official website dsssb.delhi.gov.in. The admit card contains details like exam date, time, and exam center.

item.title: Indian Army Agniveer Admit Card Download 2025
item.description: Indian Army has released the Agniveer GD Admit Card 2025 on June 16. Candidates can download it from joinindianarmy.nic.in. The Common Entrance Exam (CEE) for General Duty posts will be held from June 30 to July 3, 2025. Admit cards for other categories like Tradesmen, Technical, and Clerk/SKT will be available from June 18.
